cleaned_text: Can Ayurvedic medicine and allopathic medicine be taken together? This is one of the most common question patients have. Ayurvedic and allopathy medicine is generally not recommended together. Both the medicines have its own way of working. Ayurvedic medicine is prescribed according to the imbalance of doshas. Evry medicine has its own pathway of action. It is advised to consult your doctor before taking any such medicines. This will keep you safe and you can avoid uncertain drug interaction and side effects.
